extends java.lang.Object
this class handle the moves during the game

    • doAction

      public void doAction​(java.lang.String nickname, Point x) throws NotYourTurnException, OpponentEffectException, AlreadyBuiltException, IllegalBuildingException, IllegalMovementException, NotPossibleEndMoveException, AlreadyWalkedException, endedMoveException, OutOfOrderMoveException
      do the selected action
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname of the player
      x - the selected point
      Throws:
      NotYourTurnException - exception thrown if you can't do the action, the name is self-explanatory
      OpponentEffectException - exception thrown if you can't do the action, the name is self-explanatory
      AlreadyBuiltException - exception thrown if you can't do the action, the name is self-explanatory
      IllegalBuildingException - exception thrown if you can't do the action, the name is self-explanatory
      IllegalMovementException - exception thrown if you can't do the action, the name is self-explanatory
      NotPossibleEndMoveException - exception thrown if you can't do the action, the name is self-explanatory
      AlreadyWalkedException - exception thrown if you can't do the action, the name is self-explanatory
      endedMoveException - exception thrown if you can't do the action, the name is self-explanatory
      OutOfOrderMoveException - exception thrown if you can't do the action, the name is self-explanatory

    • getMovementsActions

      public java.util.List<Point> getMovementsActions​(java.lang.String nickname) throws NotYourTurnException, NoPossibleActionException, AlreadyWalkedException
      the player requires the points where he can move
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player nickname
      Returns:
      list of possible points
      Throws:
      NotYourTurnException - thrown if it is not the player turn
      NoPossibleActionException - thrown if the action is not possible
      AlreadyWalkedException - thrown if the players has already walked

    • getConstructionActions

      public java.util.List<Point> getConstructionActions​(java.lang.String nickname) throws NotYourTurnException, NoPossibleActionException, OutOfOrderMoveException, AlreadyBuiltException, AlreadyWalkedException
      the player requests points where he can build
      Parameters:
      nickname - the player's nickname
      Returns:
      the points where the player can build
      Throws:
      NotYourTurnException - thrown if it is not the player turn
      NoPossibleActionException - thrown if the action is not possible
      OutOfOrderMoveException - thrown if the action can not be done in this order
      AlreadyBuiltException - thrown if you can't build because the player has already done it
      AlreadyWalkedException - thrown if you can't build because the player has already walked
